wikipedia_page.main: Charles Gerald John Cadogan, 8th Earl Cadogan,  (born 24 March 1937), styled as Viscount Chelsea until 1997, is a British billionaire peer and landowner. He is a first cousin of the Aga Khan IV, spiritual head of the Ismaili sect of Shia Muslims.

link_mentions.page: List of earls in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: **Primrose (24 December 1918 – 1970). She married William Cadogan, 7th Earl Cadogan and had four children, including Charles Cadogan, 8th Earl Cadogan, before being divorced in 1960.
